comment: The sphere with center ` M ` and radius ` R ` in a generalized real Euclidean space of finite dimension. Remark: this theorem holds also for the degenerate case ` R < 0 ` (negative radius): in this case, ` ( M S R ) ` is empty. (Contributed by AV, 5-Feb-2023.)
